title: Default Prompt Library
description: Curated meta-prompts for AI workflows, research, coding, and analysis

prompts.title: Refine the following prompt using best practices (be spec...
prompts.content: Refine the following prompt using best practices (be specific, define output format, add checks). Keep plain English. Return: {final_prompt} + a 1-line rationale. Input: {draft_prompt}

prompts.title: Rewrite my prompt in 1-2 imperative sentences that captur...
prompts.content: Rewrite my prompt in 1-2 imperative sentences that capture the same intent, then show a JSON spec for inputs/outputs. Prompt: {draft}

prompts.title: Generalize this prompt so it works across models (OpenAI,...
prompts.content: Generalize this prompt so it works across models (OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini). Avoid provider-specific jargon. Prompt: {draft}

prompts.title: Generate 5 stylistic variants of this prompt (conservativ...
prompts.content: Generate 5 stylistic variants of this prompt (conservative, creative, data-centric, safety-strict, speed-first). Note likely trade-offs. Prompt: {draft}

prompts.title: List up to … high-leverage clarifying questions for …. If...
prompts.content: List up to {Q} high-leverage clarifying questions for {task}. If unanswered, state your assumptions and continue.

prompts.title: Before solving …, enumerate key assumptions, unknowns, an...
prompts.content: Before solving {task}, enumerate key assumptions, unknowns, and potential pitfalls as bullets.

prompts.title: Identify ambiguous phrases or missing details in this pro...
prompts.content: Identify ambiguous phrases or missing details in this prompt and propose precise rewrites. Prompt: {draft}

prompts.title: Act as a … advising a …. Use domain terminology sparingly...
prompts.content: Act as a {role} advising a {audience}. Use domain terminology sparingly; define jargon on first use.

prompts.title: Explain … first as a … (technical), then as a … for a …-y...
prompts.content: Explain {topic} first as a {role} (technical), then as a {teacher} for a {age}-year-old.

prompts.title: Act as a skeptical reviewer for …. Flag weak claims and s...
prompts.content: Act as a skeptical reviewer for {topic}. Flag weak claims and suggest fixes.

prompts.title: Propose a concise plan (3-7 steps) for …. Then execute th...
prompts.content: Propose a concise plan (3-7 steps) for {task}. Then execute the plan step-by-step, showing each step’s output and a final summary.

prompts.title: Break … into minimal sub-tasks with owners, inputs, outpu...
prompts.content: Break {goal} into minimal sub-tasks with owners, inputs, outputs, and acceptance criteria.

prompts.title: Outline milestones, dependencies, and top 5 risks with mi...
prompts.content: Outline milestones, dependencies, and top 5 risks with mitigations for {project}.

prompts.title: Return ONLY valid JSON matching this schema: …. If info i...
prompts.content: Return ONLY valid JSON matching this schema: {json_schema}. If info is missing, set null and add missing_notes.

prompts.title: Produce a Markdown table with columns …. Limit rows to …....
prompts.content: Produce a Markdown table with columns {columns}. Limit rows to {n}. Include a final 'Notes' row of caveats.

prompts.title: Create a report with sections …. Each ≤ … words, with bul...
prompts.content: Create a report with sections {sections}. Each ≤ {limit} words, with bullet key takeaways at the end.

prompts.title: Grade your own draft against this rubric: …. List gaps, t...
prompts.content: Grade your own draft against this rubric: {rubric}. List gaps, then deliver a revised version that resolves all gaps.

prompts.title: State pass/fail checks for …. Then produce the output and...
prompts.content: State pass/fail checks for {output}. Then produce the output and show the checklist with pass/fail ticks.

prompts.title: Answer in ≤ … words, prioritize …, and avoid …. If imposs...
prompts.content: Answer in ≤ {words} words, prioritize {criteria}, and avoid {banned}. If impossible, say why.

prompts.title: Provide an answer with 2-4 authoritative sources on …. Af...
prompts.content: Provide an answer with 2-4 authoritative sources on {topic}. After each key claim, include a citation. If uncertain, say so.

prompts.title: Build a table with Claim | Source | Evidence quality | Co...
prompts.content: Build a table with Claim | Source | Evidence quality | Counter-evidence | Confidence (0-1) for {topic}.

prompts.title: List potential errors or hallucinations in this draft, se...
prompts.content: List potential errors or hallucinations in this draft, search terms to verify them, and revised statements with hedging where needed. Draft: {draft}

prompts.title: If any request is unsafe/disallowed, refuse briefly and p...
prompts.content: If any request is unsafe/disallowed, refuse briefly and propose a safe alternative pathway to achieve the user’s intent.

prompts.title: Identify parts of the request that exceed …. Propose scop...
prompts.content: Identify parts of the request that exceed {constraints}. Propose scoped alternatives with impact estimates.

prompts.title: Generate … diverse ideas for …. Then cluster them into … ...
prompts.content: Generate {k} diverse ideas for {goal}. Then cluster them into {clusters} themes with pros/cons and wild-card picks.

prompts.title: Propose ideas that work under extreme constraints: …, …, ...
prompts.content: Propose ideas that work under extreme constraints: {budget}, {time}, {tools}. Explain why each still works.

prompts.title: Offer … analogies from … that illuminate …. Explain what ...
prompts.content: Offer {n} analogies from {domains} that illuminate {concept}. Explain what each clarifies or hides.

prompts.title: Score options by … with numeric assumptions and a ranked ...
prompts.content: Score options by {framework} with numeric assumptions and a ranked list. Highlight sensitivity.

prompts.title: Run a best-of-three tournament between top … ideas. Show ...
prompts.content: Run a best-of-three tournament between top {m} ideas. Show semifinalists, finalists, and the champion with reasons.

prompts.title: For each option, ask the single killer question most like...
prompts.content: For each option, ask the single killer question most likely to invalidate it, and estimate survivability.

prompts.title: Compare … across criteria …. Weight criteria … and comput...
prompts.content: Compare {options} across criteria {criteria}. Weight criteria {weights} and compute weighted ranks.

prompts.title: Identify options on the Pareto frontier for …. Explain im...
prompts.content: Identify options on the Pareto frontier for {decision}. Explain implications.

prompts.title: Summarize … three ways: (1) executive 5 bullets; (2) tech...
prompts.content: Summarize {text} three ways: (1) executive 5 bullets; (2) technical précis; (3) risks & unknowns.

prompts.title: Give a …-word lossy summary and a lossless outline with k...
prompts.content: Give a {words}-word lossy summary and a lossless outline with key terms preserved for {text}.

prompts.title: Summarize … while keeping author names, dates, and quoted...
prompts.content: Summarize {text} while keeping author names, dates, and quoted numbers intact. Flag uncertainties.

prompts.title: Translate … to …. Preserve technical terms; add bracketed...
prompts.content: Translate {text} to {language}. Preserve technical terms; add bracketed glosses for ambiguous phrases.

prompts.title: Rewrite … in style traits … (syntax, rhythm, form), avoid...
prompts.content: Rewrite {text} in style traits {traits} (syntax, rhythm, form), avoiding imitation of living authors’ signature content.

prompts.title: Rewrite … for … at …; keep facts and hedging.
prompts.content: Rewrite {text} for {audience} at {reading_level}; keep facts and hedging.

prompts.title: Teach …. Start with 3 common misconceptions, then a simpl...
prompts.content: Teach {topic}. Start with 3 common misconceptions, then a simple explanation, then a 3-question check.

prompts.title: Design a 30-minute learning path: concept → micro-exercis...
prompts.content: Design a 30-minute learning path: concept → micro-exercise → solution → reflection for {topic}.

prompts.title: Explain … to a …-year-old using everyday examples and a 1...
prompts.content: Explain {topic} to a {age}-year-old using everyday examples and a 1-minute metaphor.

prompts.title: Turn these requirements into user stories with acceptance...
prompts.content: Turn these requirements into user stories with acceptance criteria and edge cases. Input: {notes}.

prompts.title: Draft an OpenAPI 3.1 spec for endpoints …, including auth...
prompts.content: Draft an OpenAPI 3.1 spec for endpoints {endpoints}, including auth, error codes, and rate limits.

prompts.title: List performance, security, observability, and reliabilit...
prompts.content: List performance, security, observability, and reliability requirements for {system} with measurable targets.

prompts.title: Generate a minimal, idiomatic … project scaffold with fol...
prompts.content: Generate a minimal, idiomatic {language} project scaffold with folders, a build script, linters, and a README.

prompts.title: Define interfaces/types for …. Provide 2 usage examples a...
prompts.content: Define interfaces/types for {module}. Provide 2 usage examples and a failing test that drives implementation.

prompts.title: Implement …. Include input validation, error handling, an...
prompts.content: Implement {function}. Include input validation, error handling, and docstring examples.

prompts.title: Generate unit, property, and fuzz test ideas for …. Mark ...
prompts.content: Generate unit, property, and fuzz test ideas for {module}. Mark high-value cases with *.

prompts.title: Given this bug report, write a deterministic reproduction...
prompts.content: Given this bug report, write a deterministic reproduction script and the smallest failing test. Report: {bug_report}.

prompts.title: Create golden outputs for … representative inputs and a c...
prompts.content: Create golden outputs for {N} representative inputs and a comparator that ignores whitespace and ordering.

prompts.title: List top hypotheses for this failure …, required evidence...
prompts.content: List top hypotheses for this failure {failure}, required evidence, and quick experiments to rule them in/out.

prompts.title: Reduce this to the smallest reproducible case. Show the d...
prompts.content: Reduce this to the smallest reproducible case. Show the diff from original and why it still fails. Input: {repo_path}.

prompts.title: Propose structured logs with fields … and 5 queries that ...
prompts.content: Propose structured logs with fields {fields} and 5 queries that reveal the issue.

prompts.title: Propose a safe refactor plan for …. Identify seams, write...
prompts.content: Propose a safe refactor plan for {file}. Identify seams, write integration tests first, then refactor.

prompts.title: Optimize …. State current complexity, target, and trade-o...
prompts.content: Optimize {function}. State current complexity, target, and trade-offs. Provide benchmarks.

prompts.title: Offer two versions (low-memory vs high-speed) for … and w...
prompts.content: Offer two versions (low-memory vs high-speed) for {algorithm} and when to choose each.

prompts.title: Plan an exploratory analysis for …: schema check, missing...
prompts.content: Plan an exploratory analysis for {dataset}: schema check, missingness, distributions, outliers, target leakage.

prompts.title: Recommend chart types for answering …. Output: chart → wh...
prompts.content: Recommend chart types for answering {questions}. Output: chart → why → pitfalls.

prompts.title: Produce a chart spec in … and a 3-sentence narrative for ...
prompts.content: Produce a chart spec in {tool} and a 3-sentence narrative for non-experts.

prompts.title: Create a concept map of …: sub-areas, seminal papers (wit...
prompts.content: Create a concept map of {field}: sub-areas, seminal papers (with years), and current debates.

prompts.title: Draft a PRISMA-style search protocol with inclusion/exclu...
prompts.content: Draft a PRISMA-style search protocol with inclusion/exclusion criteria and databases to query for {topic}.

prompts.title: Rank sources by evidence strength for …, from RCTs/system...
prompts.content: Rank sources by evidence strength for {claim}, from RCTs/systematic reviews to expert opinion.

prompts.title: Propose an OKR-style plan for Q…: 3 Objectives, each with...
prompts.content: Propose an OKR-style plan for Q{q}: 3 Objectives, each with 3-5 measurable Key Results and owners.

prompts.title: Describe success in … months, then backcast milestones to...
prompts.content: Describe success in {T} months, then backcast milestones to today with leading indicators.

prompts.title: Build a risk register with likelihood, impact, owner, tri...
prompts.content: Build a risk register with likelihood, impact, owner, trigger, mitigation for {project}.

prompts.title: Turn this skeleton into a hierarchical outline with topic...
prompts.content: Turn this skeleton into a hierarchical outline with topic sentences and transitions. Input: {bullets}.

prompts.title: Edit for a consistent voice: …. Show a before/after pair ...
prompts.content: Edit for a consistent voice: {traits}. Show a before/after pair for one paragraph.

prompts.title: Tighten to … words by removing redundancy and weak hedgin...
prompts.content: Tighten to {words} words by removing redundancy and weak hedging; keep citations and numbers.

prompts.title: Write jobs-to-be-done from interviews. Input: ….
prompts.content: Write jobs-to-be-done from interviews. Input: {notes}.

prompts.title: Design 5 usability tasks with success criteria, time-on-t...
prompts.content: Design 5 usability tasks with success criteria, time-on-task targets, and post-task questions for {feature}.

prompts.title: Draft empty-state messages for … with guidance and 1 CTA ...
prompts.content: Draft empty-state messages for {features} with guidance and 1 CTA each.

prompts.title: Build a simple unit-economics table (CAC, LTV, payback) w...
prompts.content: Build a simple unit-economics table (CAC, LTV, payback) with assumptions and sensitivity described for {business}.

prompts.title: Analyze moat factors (network effects, switching costs, s...
prompts.content: Analyze moat factors (network effects, switching costs, scale) for {company}; rate each 1-5 with evidence.

prompts.title: Model bear/base/bull narratives for … with triggers to mo...
prompts.content: Model bear/base/bull narratives for {asset} with triggers to move between scenarios.

prompts.title: Try to find ways this request could lead to unsafe or bia...
prompts.content: Try to find ways this request could lead to unsafe or biased outputs. Suggest safe reformulations. Request: {request}.

prompts.title: Rewrite the prompt to avoid collecting or inferring sensi...
prompts.content: Rewrite the prompt to avoid collecting or inferring sensitive personal data while meeting the goal. Prompt: {draft}.

prompts.title: First produce a neutral, detailed description of the imag...
prompts.content: First produce a neutral, detailed description of the image(s). Then perform {task} using only that description.

prompts.title: For …, output a shot list: subject, framing, lighting, ba...
prompts.content: For {visual_goal}, output a shot list: subject, framing, lighting, background, action, constraints.

prompts.title: Summarize key events in the video with timestamps and cau...
prompts.content: Summarize key events in the video with timestamps and causal links; flag uncertain segments.

prompts.title: Use ONLY the provided context to answer. If missing, say ...
prompts.content: Use ONLY the provided context to answer. If missing, say 'not in context.' Cite chunk IDs you used. Context: {docs}.

prompts.title: Propose search queries to retrieve the missing facts for ...
prompts.content: Propose search queries to retrieve the missing facts for {question}, ranked by expected signal.

prompts.title: Ask 5 questions to calibrate tone, depth, and prior knowl...
prompts.content: Ask 5 questions to calibrate tone, depth, and prior knowledge for {audience}. Then restate the profile you'll use.

prompts.title: Summarize what you’ve learned about my preferences in thi...
prompts.content: Summarize what you’ve learned about my preferences in this session, and how you’ll apply them next time.

prompts.title: Produce a draft for …, then switch to critical reviewer t...
prompts.content: Produce a draft for {task}, then switch to critical reviewer to list weaknesses, then deliver a corrected V2.

prompts.title: Run PDCA: plan …, do (produce output), check (compare vs ...
prompts.content: Run PDCA: plan {goal}, do (produce output), check (compare vs criteria), act (final revised output).

prompts.title: After each step of …, decide whether more iterations are ...
prompts.content: After each step of {workflow}, decide whether more iterations are worth it; justify in one sentence.

prompts.title: Propose a plan that fits … and …. If not feasible, give t...
prompts.content: Propose a plan that fits {budget} and {deadline}. If not feasible, give the closest feasible plan and gap notes.

prompts.title: Solve … assuming no internet, no external libraries, and ...
prompts.content: Solve {task} assuming no internet, no external libraries, and {device} limits.

prompts.title: Given two answers, judge them against criteria …, assign ...
prompts.content: Given two answers, judge them against criteria {criteria}, assign scores with 1-sentence justifications, and pick a winner.

prompts.title: Build a 5-criterion rubric for evaluating …, each with 3 ...
prompts.content: Build a 5-criterion rubric for evaluating {artifact}, each with 3 anchor levels (poor/ok/excellent).

prompts.title: Show a brief 3-bullet plan for …, then give the final ans...
prompts.content: Show a brief 3-bullet plan for {task}, then give the final answer. Avoid revealing lengthy internal reasoning.

prompts.title: List only the key steps that would change the outcome if ...
prompts.content: List only the key steps that would change the outcome if wrong for {task}; then present the result.

prompts.title: Create a one-page briefing (Problem, Options, Recommendat...
prompts.content: Create a one-page briefing (Problem, Options, Recommendation, Risks, Next Steps) with a {word_limit}-word executive summary.

prompts.title: Anticipate 10 tough board questions about … and prepare c...
prompts.content: Anticipate 10 tough board questions about {proposal} and prepare crisp, defensible answers.

prompts.title: Convert … into a do-confirm checklist with triggers, role...
prompts.content: Convert {procedure} into a do-confirm checklist with triggers, roles, and failure handoffs.

prompts.title: Draft an incident playbook (detect, triage, contain, reme...
prompts.content: Draft an incident playbook (detect, triage, contain, remediate, postmortem) for {failure_mode}.

prompts.title: Draft three versions (direct, diplomatic, inspirational) ...
prompts.content: Draft three versions (direct, diplomatic, inspirational) of a message to {audience} about {topic}.

prompts.title: List likely objections from … and evidence-based response...
prompts.content: List likely objections from {stakeholder} and evidence-based responses; note what would change our mind.

prompts.title: Map … to relevant policies/regulations with obligations, ...
prompts.content: Map {activity} to relevant policies/regulations with obligations, evidence to collect, and audit cadence.

prompts.title: Create a data-classification matrix for …, with handling ...
prompts.content: Create a data-classification matrix for {org}, with handling rules and DLP guardrails.

prompts.title: Design an A/B test for …. Include MDE, sample size estima...
prompts.content: Design an A/B test for {metric}. Include MDE, sample size estimate, guardrail metrics, and stop criteria.

prompts.title: Given observational data for …, list threats to validity ...
prompts.content: Given observational data for {question}, list threats to validity and suitable methods (diff-in-diff, IV, matching).

prompts.title: Estimate … with a clear decomposition, 2 alternative assu...
prompts.content: Estimate {quantity} with a clear decomposition, 2 alternative assumptions, and a sanity check.

prompts.title: Provide an order-of-magnitude bound for … and identify th...
prompts.content: Provide an order-of-magnitude bound for {problem} and identify the dominant term.

prompts.title: Turn this to-do list into a time-blocked schedule for …, ...
prompts.content: Turn this to-do list into a time-blocked schedule for {day}, with energy matching and buffers. List: {tasks}.

prompts.title: Split … into a 20-minute starter, define a minimum viable...
prompts.content: Split {task} into a 20-minute starter, define a minimum viable win, and a reward/penalty.

prompts.title: State the problem in one sentence, then list … success cr...
prompts.content: State the problem in one sentence, then list {n} success criteria and define the audience {audience}.

prompts.title: Rewrite the research question using … and list measurable...
prompts.content: Rewrite the research question using {framework} and list measurable variables and outcomes.

prompts.title: Generate … search strings for … covering synonyms, Boolea...
prompts.content: Generate {k} search strings for {engine} covering synonyms, Boolean operators, fields, and date filters for {topic}. Explain rationale for each string.

prompts.title: Propose a two-pass search: pass A for high recall, pass B...
prompts.content: Propose a two-pass search: pass A for high recall, pass B for high precision, with stop rules and logging format.

prompts.title: Perform a lateral reading pass: identify author/org, fund...
prompts.content: Perform a lateral reading pass: identify author/org, funding, independent references, and credibility signals for {source}. Output a brief verdict with caveats.

prompts.title: List … independent sources that profile or evaluate … and...
prompts.content: List {m} independent sources that profile or evaluate {organization/person/claim} and summarize convergence/divergence.

prompts.title: Create title/abstract screening rules for … and apply to ...
prompts.content: Create title/abstract screening rules for {topic} and apply to {N} citations. Output keep/maybe/drop with one-line reasons.

prompts.title: Produce a PRISMA-like log (identification→screening→eligi...
prompts.content: Produce a PRISMA-like log (identification→screening→eligibility→included) for this batch of records: {records}.

prompts.title: Score each source on Currency, Relevance, Authority, Accu...
prompts.content: Score each source on Currency, Relevance, Authority, Accuracy, and Purpose (1–5) for {topic}; justify each score.

prompts.title: Create a quick credibility rubric tailored to … and apply...
prompts.content: Create a quick credibility rubric tailored to {domain} and apply it to {N} sources.

prompts.title: Classify study design and rate certainty of evidence usin...
prompts.content: Classify study design and rate certainty of evidence using {system} for claims about {claim}. Explain any downgrades/upgrades.

prompts.title: Build a table: Claim | Study Type | Risk of Bias | Consis...
prompts.content: Build a table: Claim | Study Type | Risk of Bias | Consistency | Directness | Precision | Overall Certainty.

prompts.title: Run … on this text: output Survey questions, key answers ...
prompts.content: Run {method} on this text: output Survey questions, key answers from Read, Recite bullets, and a {word_limit}-word Review.

prompts.title: Extract key terms and define each; attach the exemplar se...
prompts.content: Extract key terms and define each; attach the exemplar sentence from the text for context.

prompts.title: Produce 50-, 150-, and 400-word summaries of …; list top ...
prompts.content: Produce 50-, 150-, and 400-word summaries of {text}; list top 3 takeaways and 2 uncertainties with page/section references.

prompts.title: Create a ‘lossy’ summary (≤… words) and a ‘lossless’ outl...
prompts.content: Create a ‘lossy’ summary (≤{words} words) and a ‘lossless’ outline preserving terminology and numbers.

prompts.title: Turn the reading into Cornell Notes: Cues, Notes, Summary...
prompts.content: Turn the reading into Cornell Notes: Cues, Notes, Summary (≤{summary_words} words).

prompts.title: Create Zettelkasten-style atomic notes from …: one idea p...
prompts.content: Create Zettelkasten-style atomic notes from {text}: one idea per note with links (see also) and source citation.

prompts.title: Build a synthesis matrix: rows=sources, cols=…. Fill with...
prompts.content: Build a synthesis matrix: rows=sources, cols={themes}. Fill with evidence snippets + citation IDs.

prompts.title: List nodes and labeled edges for a concept map of …; incl...
prompts.content: List nodes and labeled edges for a concept map of {topic}; include {p} core propositions.

prompts.title: Extract Claim, Data, Warrant, Backing, Qualifier, Rebutta...
prompts.content: Extract Claim, Data, Warrant, Backing, Qualifier, Rebuttal for each main argument in {text}.

prompts.title: Identify causal claims and rewrite them as testable state...
prompts.content: Identify causal claims and rewrite them as testable statements; list potential confounders.

prompts.title: Compare … across criteria …. Apply weights … and compute ...
prompts.content: Compare {options} across criteria {criteria}. Apply weights {weights} and compute a ranked decision table.

prompts.title: Identify options on the Pareto frontier for … and explain...
prompts.content: Identify options on the Pareto frontier for {decision} and explain trade-offs.

prompts.title: List contradictions across sources about …; propose tests...
prompts.content: List contradictions across sources about {topic}; propose tests or evidence needed to reconcile them.

prompts.title: Identify research gaps and formulate … sharp questions or...
prompts.content: Identify research gaps and formulate {k} sharp questions or experiments to close them.

prompts.title: Write a synthesis stating consensus, major disagreements,...
prompts.content: Write a synthesis stating consensus, major disagreements, and research gaps; include inline citations after each claim.

prompts.title: Create a one-page brief (Problem, Evidence snapshot, Opti...
prompts.content: Create a one-page brief (Problem, Evidence snapshot, Options, Recommendation, Risks, Next steps) for {audience}.

prompts.title: For each key claim in …, provide … authoritative sources....
prompts.content: For each key claim in {draft}, provide {2_to_4} authoritative sources. Mark claim-level confidence (0–1) and note any uncertainties.

prompts.title: Build an evidence matrix: Claim | Source | Evidence quote...
prompts.content: Build an evidence matrix: Claim | Source | Evidence quote | Counter-evidence | Assessment | Confidence (0–1).

prompts.title: Run a verification pass: list likely hallucinations or we...
prompts.content: Run a verification pass: list likely hallucinations or weakly-supported statements and propose targeted search terms to verify them.

prompts.title: Convert raw references into a consistent style …; de-dupl...
prompts.content: Convert raw references into a consistent style {style}; de-duplicate, fix author/year/title fields, and add DOIs/URLs when available.

prompts.title: Validate each in-text citation maps to a reference entry;...
prompts.content: Validate each in-text citation maps to a reference entry; flag missing/extra references and produce a fix plan.

prompts.title: Check references for retraction/expressions of concern; o...
prompts.content: Check references for retraction/expressions of concern; output a table with status, date, and replacement suggestions.

prompts.title: Scan for plagiarism risk by locating close paraphrases/qu...
prompts.content: Scan for plagiarism risk by locating close paraphrases/quotes lacking citation in {draft}; list fixes.

prompts.title: Audit time-sensitive claims in …; for each, specify last-...
prompts.content: Audit time-sensitive claims in {draft}; for each, specify last-known-good date and whether an update search is required.

prompts.title: Propose an update plan: search cadence, key sources/feeds...
prompts.content: Propose an update plan: search cadence, key sources/feeds, and change-log format for {topic}.

prompts.title: Validate stated numbers (rates, percentages, denominators...
prompts.content: Validate stated numbers (rates, percentages, denominators). Recompute and show work; flag rounding or base-rate errors.

prompts.title: Check statistical claims for misuse (p-values, confidence...
prompts.content: Check statistical claims for misuse (p-values, confidence intervals, multiple comparisons) and suggest clearer phrasing.

prompts.title: Detect internal contradictions within … and cross-documen...
prompts.content: Detect internal contradictions within {draft} and cross-document inconsistencies against {corpus}. Provide reconciliations or corrections.

prompts.title: List assumptions used across sections and verify they rem...
prompts.content: List assumptions used across sections and verify they remain consistent; note any scope creep.

prompts.title: Assess diversity of sources by type (primary/secondary), ...
prompts.content: Assess diversity of sources by type (primary/secondary), geography, time, and viewpoint for {topic}; identify blind spots.

prompts.title: Recommend … additional sources to balance coverage, with ...
prompts.content: Recommend {k} additional sources to balance coverage, with a short justification for each.

prompts.title: From current results, infer missing facets and generate r...
prompts.content: From current results, infer missing facets and generate refined queries; explain expected marginal value.

prompts.title: Run a relevance-feedback loop: label top … results as rel...
prompts.content: Run a relevance-feedback loop: label top {N} results as relevant/irrelevant and propose the next query batch.

prompts.title: Extract structured data from …: Study ID, Population, Int...
prompts.content: Extract structured data from {papers}: Study ID, Population, Intervention/Exposure, Comparator, Outcomes, Effect sizes, Notes.

prompts.title: Build a summary table with standardized effect metrics an...
prompts.content: Build a summary table with standardized effect metrics and interpret heterogeneity qualitatively.

prompts.title: Create a methods log: search strings, dates, databases, i...
prompts.content: Create a methods log: search strings, dates, databases, inclusion/exclusion rules, and screening outcomes for {topic}.

prompts.title: Produce a change log listing each revision to …, its reas...
prompts.content: Produce a change log listing each revision to {draft}, its reason, and evidence triggering the change.
